review: This is a wonderful product that does exactly what it says.  It's nice to be able to stream video from any device wireless.  I would would be a lot nicer if I had USB ports on my TV to power it.  Make sure you have USB capability or an outlet close by for the short power cord.
author: Richard L. Strasemeier

review: I got excited when I learned that there is a device that can transmit video signals from my laptop to TV. So i bought one from Amazon about 3 months ago which was cheaper than Bestbuy though. Got it, set it up, it worked like a champ on my laptop, Sony Xperio, and Galaxy Note 2 to TV. I will get another one today for another TV in my Salon business.

review: This is a great device!  Its almost to easy to setup and its fool proof to use.  Its got a lot of things coming out for it all the time and I am satisfied with its current offerings.  I can't wait for the games to adapt to it more.  Also for the price its amazing!
author: Carlo

review: Purchased this yesterday and spent most of the day trying to set it up. After searching web forums and reconfiguring my router, I finally found a Google number that I can call for live assistance. Seems that this product will not work with a dual-band router unless each band acts independently. Called Netgear to try to configure the router as needed, only to learn that its free assistance is only for ninety days!  What a racket.Anyway, I gave up, brought it back to Bestbuy and exchanged it for Apple TV., which was up and running in five minutes.Sorry, Google.  I gave you a chance but you blew it on the lack of technical help. You owe me an afternoon back.
author: John Clahane
